items.category: Can I request a price quote for the training I'm interested in?
items.question: Infos”
items.answer:
For the “Humanitarian Programme Manager” diploma course at Bioforce: once you have applied,  you can download the quote on your Application Platform (“Infos” menu, then “Formations diplômantes Europe et VAE : mes devis personnalisables”).






For open training courses, please note that we cannot issue individual price quotes until your application has been received and accepted. Should you need an official document mentioning the cost of the training before you even apply, please feel free to download the course webpage (training programme, dates, cost…).
items.answer_html:
• For the “Humanitarian Programme Manager” diploma course at Bioforce: once you have applied,  you can download the quote on your Application Platform (“Infos” menu, then “Formations diplômantes Europe et VAE : mes devis personnalisables”).
  • For open training courses, please note that we cannot issue individual price quotes until your application has been received and accepted. Should you need an official document mentioning the cost of the training before you even apply, please feel free to download the course webpage (training programme, dates, cost…).

items.category: What should I do to secure my place in the chosen training?
items.question: Question 1
items.answer: Once your application is accepted, you will receive some documents: to secure your place, you must send us the full training fees along with these signed documents
items.answer_html: Once your application is accepted, you will receive some documents: to secure your place, you must send us the full training fees along with these signed documents

items.category: I need to apply for a visa, how can Bioforce help me ?
items.question: Question 1
items.answer: Please check you allow enough time to process the visa application. It is also advised you book your flight ticket and your accommodation place and take out insurance policy before applying for a visa
items.answer_html: Please check you allow enough time to process the visa application. It is also advised you book your flight ticket and your accommodation place and take out insurance policy before applying for a visa

items.category: What do the training fees include?
items.question: Question 1
items.answer: The cost of our trainings covers training facilitation. It does not include accommodation, meals, transportation or sundry expenses.
items.answer_html: The cost of our trainings covers training facilitation. It does not include accommodation, meals, transportation or sundry expenses.

items.category: How do I find accommodation?
items.question: Question 1
items.answer: To help you find accommodation and once your application is accepted, we will give you a list of places where you can book a room either in Lyon city center, or near Bioforce in Venissieux. You can also visit websites such as Booking. We advise you start house hunting as soon as possible as Lyon is a very busy city!
items.answer_html: To help you find accommodation and once your application is accepted, we will give you a list of places where you can book a room either in Lyon city center, or near Bioforce in Venissieux. You can also visit websites such as Booking. We advise you start house hunting as soon as possible as Lyon is a very busy city!

items.category: How do I get to Bioforce (in Lyon-Vénissieux, France)?
items.question: By PUBLIC TRANSPORT
items.answer: By CAR
items.answer_html: By CAR

items.category: Should I bring my own equipment?
items.question: Question 1
items.answer: You need to bring your own material (sheets of paper, pencil…) for Bioforce training courses. Please note that laptops are usually not accepted in training sessions except for some modules and practical cases. Bioforce will inform you, when laptops are necessary.
items.answer_html: You need to bring your own material (sheets of paper, pencil…) for Bioforce training courses. Please note that laptops are usually not accepted in training sessions except for some modules and practical cases. Bioforce will inform you, when laptops are necessary.

items.category: What is the application and selection process for open training courses?

items.answer_html: 2. Once you’ve completed and sent it, we will contact you by email to inform you about the next steps.

items.category: Is there an application deadline for open training courses?
items.question: Question 1
items.answer: Pre-registration applications are carried on a permanent basis. As the number of participants is limited, you are advised to apply as soon as possible. However please note that registration process closes two weeks prior to the start of the training and please also note that if you need to apply for a visa, it is more than advised to apply for the training at least 4 weeks prior to the training.
items.answer_html: Pre-registration applications are carried on a permanent basis. As the number of participants is limited, you are advised to apply as soon as possible. However please note that registration process closes two weeks prior to the start of the training and please also note that if you need to apply for a visa, it is more than advised to apply for the training at least 4 weeks prior to the training.

items.category: I have applied online for an open training course: what is the next step?
items.question: Question 1
items.answer: Got the automatic email? Great. You are done for now: within 15 days, we will contact you by email to inform you about the next steps.
items.answer_html: Got the automatic email? Great. You are done for now: within 15 days, we will contact you by email to inform you about the next steps.

items.category: Will I receive the training contents after the open course training?
items.question: Question 1
items.answer: At the end of the training, you will receive a flash drive including the training contents that have been used and other participants’ contact details (e-mail) .
items.answer_html: At the end of the training, you will receive a flash drive including the training contents that have been used and other participants’ contact details (e-mail) .

items.category: Are open training courses available as distance learning courses?
items.question: Question 1
items.answer: Some of our training courses are available as distant training courses.
items.answer_html: Some of our training courses are available as distant training courses.

items.category: Can I combine several open training courses in order to get a diploma?
items.question: Question 1
items.answer: Yes! The “Humanitarian Programme Manager” diploma course consists of 6 open training courses, followed by a 6-month workbased learning in the field with an NGO. You can hone your skills further and get this diploma at your own pace by attending all the open training courses that it is made up of,  and the 6-month workbased learning, spread out over up to 4,5 years.
items.answer_html: Yes! The “Humanitarian Programme Manager” diploma course consists of 6 open training courses, followed by a 6-month workbased learning in the field with an NGO. You can hone your skills further and get this diploma at your own pace by attending all the open training courses that it is made up of,  and the 6-month workbased learning, spread out over up to 4,5 years.

items.category: What diploma courses are offered by Bioforce?
items.question: At your own pace.
items.answer: At your own pace. You can also choose one or several specific modules among these diploma courses.
items.answer_html: At your own pace. You can also choose one or several specific modules among these diploma courses.

items.category: Can I get the "Humanitarian programme manager" diploma at my own pace?
items.question: Question 1
items.answer: Yes! The “Humanitarian Programme Manager” diploma course consists of 6 open training courses, followed by a 6-month workbased learning in the field with an NGO.  You can now get this diploma at your own pace by attending all the open training courses that it is made up of, and the 6-month workbased learning, spread out over up to 4,5 years.
items.answer_html: Yes! The “Humanitarian Programme Manager” diploma course consists of 6 open training courses, followed by a 6-month workbased learning in the field with an NGO.  You can now get this diploma at your own pace by attending all the open training courses that it is made up of, and the 6-month workbased learning, spread out over up to 4,5 years.

items.category: Is there an application deadline?
items.question: Question 1
items.answer:
Pre-registration applications are carried on a permanent basis. As the number of participants is limited, you are advised to apply as soon as possible. However please note that if you need to apply for a visa, it is more than advised to apply for the training at least 6 weeks prior to the training.
For the MSc in Humanitarian Programme Management the registration close the 1st july of the year.
items.answer_html:
Pre-registration applications are carried on a permanent basis. As the number of participants is limited, you are advised to apply as soon as possible. However please note that if you need to apply for a visa, it is more than advised to apply for the training at least 6 weeks prior to the training.
For the MSc in Humanitarian Programme Management the registration close the 1st july of the year.

items.question: Western Union or WARI
items.answer: Got the automatic email? As mentioned in the training brochure, your application will be examined by the Bioforce staff upon receipt of the FCFA 20.000 administration fees.

items.category: Will I receive a certificate at the end of the diploma courses?
items.question: Question 1
items.answer: For the 18-month MSc in Humanitarian Programme Management: a “Master of Science in Humanitarian Programme Management” awarded by Bioforce and Grenoble Ecole de Management, accredited by the Conférence des Grandes Écoles.
items.answer_html: For the 18-month MSc in Humanitarian Programme Management: a “Master of Science in Humanitarian Programme Management” awarded by Bioforce and Grenoble Ecole de Management, accredited by the Conférence des Grandes Écoles.

items.category: Will I receive the training contents after the training?
items.question: Question 1
items.answer: At the end of each week, training contents will be uploaded on Bioforce learning platform. At the end of the training, you will receive a Flash drive including the training contents used and all participants’ e-mail contact details.
items.answer_html: At the end of each week, training contents will be uploaded on Bioforce learning platform. At the end of the training, you will receive a Flash drive including the training contents used and all participants’ e-mail contact details.

items.category: Are diploma courses available as distant learning trainings?
items.question: Question 1
items.answer: Not yet. Training courses take place for the moment in Bioforce’s premises.
items.answer_html: Not yet. Training courses take place for the moment in Bioforce’s premises.

items.category: I have applied online for an individual career guidance interview: what is the next step?
items.question: Question 1
items.answer: Got the automatic email? Great. You are done for now: within 10 days, we will contact you by email to schedule an appointment with one of our career guidance counsellors, and will inform you about payment terms.
items.answer_html: Got the automatic email? Great. You are done for now: within 10 days, we will contact you by email to schedule an appointment with one of our career guidance counsellors, and will inform you about payment terms.

items.category: I have applied online for Recognition of Prior Learning: what is the next step?
items.question: Question 1
items.answer: Got the automatic email? Great. You are done for now: within 10 days, we will send you a complete application file by email, for you to fill in and send back, and will inform you about payment terms.
items.answer_html: Got the automatic email? Great. You are done for now: within 10 days, we will send you a complete application file by email, for you to fill in and send back, and will inform you about payment terms.
